long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Litecoin Browserextension

LiteWorlds is an extension for accessing litecoin enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps" in your normal Chrome browser!

The extension injects the Litecoin web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from the blockchain.

With a full inbuild User Managment + Two Factor Authentication System 
LiteWorlds can be used as global login for many "dApps" without hesitation.
